sentences.question: Could you please send me the report by EOD?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda mengirimkan laporan kepada saya sebelum akhir hari?

sentences.question: I will be in a meeting all morning.
sentences.answer: Saya akan berada di rapat sepanjang pagi.

sentences.question: Can we schedule a call to discuss this?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita menjadwalkan panggilan untuk membahas ini?

sentences.question: Please let me know if you need any assistance.
sentences.answer: Silakan beri tahu saya jika Anda memerlukan bantuan.

sentences.question: I'm following up on my previous email.
sentences.answer: Saya menindaklanjuti email saya sebelumnya.

sentences.question: Do you have a minute to talk?
sentences.answer: Apakah Anda punya waktu sebentar untuk berbicara?

sentences.question: I appreciate your prompt response.
sentences.answer: Saya menghargai tanggapan cepat Anda.

sentences.question: Can you clarify the deadline for this project?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda menjelaskan tenggat waktu untuk proyek ini?

sentences.question: Let's brainstorm some ideas.
sentences.answer: Mari kita curah pendapat beberapa ide.

sentences.question: I will take care of it.
sentences.answer: Saya akan mengurusnya.

sentences.question: Could you review my presentation?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda meninjau presentasi saya?

sentences.question: We need to improve our workflow.
sentences.answer: Kita perlu meningkatkan alur kerja kita.

sentences.question: What are your thoughts on this proposal?
sentences.answer: Apa pendapat Anda tentang proposal ini?

sentences.question: I will get back to you shortly.
sentences.answer: Saya akan menghubungi Anda segera.

sentences.question: Let's set up a meeting for next week.
sentences.answer: Mari kita atur pertemuan untuk minggu depan.

sentences.question: Please keep me updated on the progress.
sentences.answer: Silakan beri saya informasi terbaru tentang perkembangan.

sentences.question: I look forward to hearing from you.
sentences.answer: Saya menunggu kabar dari Anda.

sentences.question: Is this task a priority?
sentences.answer: Apakah tugas ini menjadi prioritas?

sentences.question: Thank you for your cooperation.
sentences.answer: Terima kasih atas kerjasamanya.

sentences.question: Can we wrap this up by the end of the day?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita menyelesaikannya sebelum akhir hari?

sentences.question: I need your input on this matter.
sentences.answer: Saya memerlukan masukan Anda tentang masalah ini.

sentences.question: What time is our meeting scheduled?
sentences.answer: Jam berapa rapat kita dijadwalkan?

sentences.question: Can I have your feedback on this?
sentences.answer: Bolehkah saya mendapatkan umpan balik Anda tentang ini?

sentences.question: I'm running late, will be there in 10 minutes.
sentences.answer: Saya terlambat, akan tiba dalam 10 menit.

sentences.question: We should follow up with the client.
sentences.answer: Kita harus menindaklanjuti dengan klien.

sentences.question: Let me know if you have any questions.
sentences.answer: Beri tahu saya jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan.

sentences.question: I'm here if you need anything.
sentences.answer: Saya di sini jika Anda membutuhkan sesuatu.

sentences.question: It's important to meet the deadline.
sentences.answer: Penting untuk memenuhi tenggat waktu.

sentences.question: I hope to finish this project soon.
sentences.answer: Saya berharap dapat menyelesaikan proyek ini segera.

sentences.question: Can we discuss this further in our next meeting?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita membahas ini lebih lanjut di rapat kita berikutnya?

sentences.question: Could you please remind me of our deadlines?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda mengingatkan saya tentang tenggat waktu kita?

sentences.question: This is a high-priority task.
sentences.answer: Ini adalah tugas dengan prioritas tinggi.

sentences.question: I need to prepare for the presentation.
sentences.answer: Saya perlu mempersiapkan presentasi.

sentences.question: I appreciate your understanding.
sentences.answer: Saya menghargai pengertian Anda.

sentences.question: Let’s take a break for lunch.
sentences.answer: Mari kita istirahat untuk makan siang.

sentences.question: Can you share the agenda for the meeting?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda membagikan agenda untuk rapat?

sentences.question: I'm looking forward to our collaboration.
sentences.answer: Saya menantikan kolaborasi kita.

sentences.question: Let's keep the lines of communication open.
sentences.answer: Mari kita jaga saluran komunikasi tetap terbuka.

sentences.question: Can I get your thoughts on this matter?
sentences.answer: Bisakah saya mendapatkan pemikiran Anda tentang masalah ini?

sentences.question: I'll send you the updated document.
sentences.answer: Saya akan mengirimkan dokumen yang diperbarui.

sentences.question: It was nice to see you today.
sentences.answer: Senang bertemu Anda hari ini.

sentences.question: How was your weekend?
sentences.answer: Bagaimana akhir pekan Anda?

sentences.question: Did you have a chance to review the document?
sentences.answer: Apakah Anda sempat meninjau dokumen itu?

sentences.question: I think we should focus on our goals.
sentences.answer: Saya rasa kita harus fokus pada tujuan kita.

sentences.question: Let’s make sure we stay on track.
sentences.answer: Mari kita pastikan kita tetap di jalur.

sentences.question: Can we prioritize this task?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita memprioritaskan tugas ini?

sentences.question: I’ll be out of the office tomorrow.
sentences.answer: Saya akan keluar kantor besok.

sentences.question: Is there anything else I can help you with?
sentences.answer: Apakah ada yang bisa saya bantu?

sentences.question: I appreciate your hard work.
sentences.answer: Saya menghargai kerja keras Anda.

sentences.question: We need to allocate more resources to this project.
sentences.answer: Kita perlu mengalokasikan lebih banyak sumber daya untuk proyek ini.

sentences.question: Can you help me with this issue?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda membantu saya dengan masalah ini?

sentences.question: I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
sentences.answer: Saya minta maaf atas ketidaknyamanan ini.

sentences.question: Let’s review the minutes from last meeting.
sentences.answer: Mari kita tinjau notulen dari rapat terakhir.

sentences.question: I think we’re making great progress.
sentences.answer: Saya rasa kita sudah membuat kemajuan yang baik.

sentences.question: Let’s focus on solutions.
sentences.answer: Mari kita fokus pada solusi.

sentences.question: We need to stay within budget.
sentences.answer: Kita perlu tetap dalam anggaran.

sentences.question: How can we improve our processes?
sentences.answer: Bagaimana kita bisa meningkatkan proses kita?

sentences.question: I will follow up with you next week.
sentences.answer: Saya akan menindaklanjuti dengan Anda minggu depan.

sentences.question: What do you think about this strategy?
sentences.answer: Apa pendapat Anda tentang strategi ini?

sentences.question: Can you send me the latest updates?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda mengirimkan saya pembaruan terbaru?

sentences.question: It’s great to see everyone today.
sentences.answer: Senang melihat semua orang hari ini.

sentences.question: We need to address these concerns.
sentences.answer: Kita perlu menangani kekhawatiran ini.

sentences.question: Thank you for your feedback.
sentences.answer: Terima kasih atas umpan balik Anda.

sentences.question: I appreciate your patience.
sentences.answer: Saya menghargai kesabaran Anda.

sentences.question: Let’s not rush this decision.
sentences.answer: Mari kita tidak terburu-buru dalam keputusan ini.

sentences.question: We should celebrate our successes.
sentences.answer: Kita harus merayakan kesuksesan kita.

sentences.question: Can you clarify your last statement?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda menjelaskan pernyataan terakhir Anda?

sentences.question: I’ll be happy to help you.
sentences.answer: Saya akan senang membantu Anda.

sentences.question: Please confirm your attendance.
sentences.answer: Silakan konfirmasi kehadiran Anda.

sentences.question: How are you managing your workload?
sentences.answer: Bagaimana Anda mengelola beban kerja Anda?

sentences.question: Let's meet to discuss the new project.
sentences.answer: Mari kita bertemu untuk membahas proyek baru.

sentences.question: Can I borrow your pen for a moment?
sentences.answer: Bolehkah saya meminjam pulpen Anda sebentar?

sentences.question: What do you want to achieve with this meeting?
sentences.answer: Apa yang ingin Anda capai dengan rapat ini?

sentences.question: Do you have the client’s contact information?
sentences.answer: Apakah Anda memiliki informasi kontak klien?

sentences.question: I will send you the meeting notes.
sentences.answer: Saya akan mengirimkan catatan rapat kepada Anda.

sentences.question: Could you give me an overview of the project?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda memberikan gambaran umum tentang proyek ini?

sentences.question: I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed the training.
sentences.answer: Saya senang mendengar bahwa Anda menikmati pelatihan.

sentences.question: We need to finalize the budget.
sentences.answer: Kita perlu menyelesaikan anggaran.

sentences.question: Let's aim to complete this by next week.
sentences.answer: Mari kita targetkan untuk menyelesaikannya minggu depan.

sentences.question: Can you please elaborate on that?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda menjelaskan lebih lanjut tentang itu?

sentences.question: I’m working on the presentation for Friday.
sentences.answer: Saya sedang mengerjakan presentasi untuk hari Jumat.

sentences.question: What time should we start the meeting?
sentences.answer: Jam berapa kita harus memulai rapat?

sentences.question: I need to step out for a moment.
sentences.answer: Saya perlu keluar sebentar.

sentences.question: Let's connect later this week.
sentences.answer: Mari kita terhubung lagi akhir minggu ini.

sentences.question: We can discuss this in detail during our meeting.
sentences.answer: Kita bisa membahas ini secara rinci selama rapat kita.

sentences.question: I think we should revisit our strategy.
sentences.answer: Saya rasa kita harus meninjau kembali strategi kita.

sentences.question: Can you explain your reasoning behind this decision?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda menjelaskan alasan di balik keputusan ini?

sentences.question: I’m happy to take on that responsibility.
sentences.answer: Saya senang mengambil tanggung jawab itu.

sentences.question: We are looking forward to your insights.
sentences.answer: Kami menantikan wawasan Anda.

sentences.question: Can you provide a status update?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda memberikan pembaruan status?

sentences.question: This needs to be addressed immediately.
sentences.answer: Ini perlu ditangani segera.

sentences.question: What are the next steps?
sentences.answer: Apa langkah selanjutnya?

sentences.question: I'm glad you brought that up.
sentences.answer: Saya senang Anda mengangkat hal itu.

sentences.question: Let's make sure we're all aligned.
sentences.answer: Mari kita pastikan kita semua selaras.

sentences.question: Can we get this done by tomorrow?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita menyelesaikannya sebelum besok?

sentences.question: I would like to hear your perspective.
sentences.answer: Saya ingin mendengar perspektif Anda.

sentences.question: I appreciate your attention to detail.
sentences.answer: Saya menghargai perhatian Anda terhadap detail.

sentences.question: Please reach out if you have any concerns.
sentences.answer: Silakan hubungi jika Anda memiliki kekhawatiran.

sentences.question: Let's review the performance metrics together.
sentences.answer: Mari kita tinjau metrik kinerja bersama-sama.

sentences.question: I'm confident we can achieve our goals.
sentences.answer: Saya yakin kita bisa mencapai tujuan kita.

sentences.question: Can we allocate more time for this task?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita mengalokasikan lebih banyak waktu untuk tugas ini?

sentences.question: I will keep you posted on any updates.
sentences.answer: Saya akan memberi tahu Anda tentang pembaruan apa pun.

sentences.question: Let’s ensure we have all the necessary materials.
sentences.answer: Mari kita pastikan kita memiliki semua materi yang diperlukan.

sentences.question: I'm excited to see the results of our efforts.
sentences.answer: Saya bersemangat melihat hasil dari usaha kita.

sentences.question: What do you think about the proposed changes?
sentences.answer: Apa pendapat Anda tentang perubahan yang diusulkan?

sentences.question: Can you summarize the main points?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda merangkum poin-poin utama?

sentences.question: Let’s make a plan to address these issues.
sentences.answer: Mari kita buat rencana untuk menangani masalah ini.

sentences.question: I look forward to collaborating with you.
sentences.answer: Saya menantikan untuk bekerja sama dengan Anda.

sentences.question: I will provide more information as it becomes available.
sentences.answer: Saya akan memberikan lebih banyak informasi saat tersedia.

sentences.question: This feedback is valuable for our improvement.
sentences.answer: Umpan balik ini sangat berharga untuk perbaikan kita.

sentences.question: Let's stay focused on our objectives.
sentences.answer: Mari kita tetap fokus pada tujuan kita.

sentences.question: Thank you for your understanding and support.
sentences.answer: Terima kasih atas pengertian dan dukungan Anda.

sentences.question: Could you share your thoughts on this topic?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda membagikan pemikiran Anda tentang topik ini?

sentences.question: I’ll follow up on this matter.
sentences.answer: Saya akan menindaklanjuti masalah ini.

sentences.question: Let’s aim for clarity in our communications.
sentences.answer: Mari kita targetkan untuk kejelasan dalam komunikasi kita.

sentences.question: Can we discuss this further later?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita membahas ini lebih lanjut nanti?

sentences.question: Please let me know your availability.
sentences.answer: Silakan beri tahu saya ketersediaan Anda.

sentences.question: What resources do we have available?
sentences.answer: Sumber daya apa yang kita miliki?

sentences.question: I will make sure to incorporate your suggestions.
sentences.answer: Saya akan memastikan untuk memasukkan saran Anda.

sentences.question: I appreciate the efforts made by the team.
sentences.answer: Saya menghargai usaha yang dilakukan oleh tim.

sentences.question: Let’s ensure we meet our commitments.
sentences.answer: Mari kita pastikan kita memenuhi komitmen kita.

sentences.question: What challenges do you foresee?
sentences.answer: Tantangan apa yang Anda lihat ke depan?

sentences.question: I look forward to your response.
sentences.answer: Saya menantikan tanggapan Anda.

sentences.question: Let’s keep each other informed.
sentences.answer: Mari kita saling memberi tahu.

sentences.question: I’m happy to assist with this project.
sentences.answer: Saya senang membantu proyek ini.

sentences.question: Can you provide an update on the client’s feedback?
sentences.answer: Bisakah Anda memberikan pembaruan tentang umpan balik klien?

sentences.question: I hope to resolve this issue quickly.
sentences.answer: Saya berharap dapat menyelesaikan masalah ini dengan cepat.

sentences.question: Let’s establish a timeline for this project.
sentences.answer: Mari kita tetapkan garis waktu untuk proyek ini.

sentences.question: What should be our next steps?
sentences.answer: Apa langkah selanjutnya yang harus kita ambil?

sentences.question: Can we make adjustments based on this feedback?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita membuat penyesuaian berdasarkan umpan balik ini?

sentences.question: I appreciate your insights on this matter.
sentences.answer: Saya menghargai wawasan Anda tentang masalah ini.

sentences.question: Let’s make sure we’re aligned on our goals.
sentences.answer: Mari kita pastikan kita selaras dengan tujuan kita.

sentences.question: I would like to discuss this further.
sentences.answer: Saya ingin membahas ini lebih lanjut.

sentences.question: Please share any concerns you may have.
sentences.answer: Silakan bagikan kekhawatiran yang mungkin Anda miliki.

sentences.question: Can we have a quick check-in later?
sentences.answer: Bisakah kita melakukan pemeriksaan cepat nanti?

sentences.question: I'm grateful for your support.
sentences.answer: Saya berterima kasih atas dukungan Anda.

sentences.question: Let’s recap our discussion.
sentences.answer: Mari kita ringkas diskusi kita.

sentences.question: I’m looking forward to our next meeting.
sentences.answer: Saya menantikan rapat kita berikutnya.

phrases.question: I would like to order food.
I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
phrases.answer: Saya minta maaf atas ketidaknyamanan ini.

phrases.question: I need some time to think.
Could you send me the details?
I'm not available at that time.
phrases.answer: Saya tidak tersedia pada waktu itu.
